articles.description: Prince Andrew will be attending a service giving thanks to the Duke of Edinburgh and it will be his first public appearance since the out-of-court agreement was made with his accuser Virginia Giuffre
articles.content:
Prince Andrew will attend a service of thanksgiving to the Duke of Edinburgh but key members of the Royal Family will not be there.

articles.title: Documents for Prince Harry's case against Home Office to remain secret though judge slams legal team - Daily Mail
articles.description: Harry is bringing a claim against the department after being told he would no longer be given the 'same degree' of personal protective security when visiting from the US.
articles.content:
Are Harry and his family covered by security arrangements currently?
He and his wife, the Duchess of Sussex, personally fund a private protection team in the US for their family.
